Today the House passed the Voting Rights Advancement Act. I was proud to have co-sponsored this critical legislation that ends voter suppression and ensures every eligible American voter has full access to the ballot box and the ability to have their voice heard. #RestoreTheVote

Today the House passed S.178, the UIGHUR Act, which counters China’s brutal repression of the #Uighurs and other Muslim minorities. I spoke on the House Floor earlier today to urge my colleagues to pass this important bill. See my full remarks here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R5e13Ybwrw4&feature=youtu.be …

We are experiencing a #ClimateCrisis. I am proud to be represented by @SpeakerPelosi and my Democratic colleagues at the 2019 United Nations Framework on Climate Change. It is imperative that we honor our contribution under the Paris Agreement. It is time for action. #COP25
